timeline.content: Hello yasir thank you for selecting UCL accommodation portal powered by amberstudents please confirm when can we connect to discuss about your accommodation.

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Welcome to Giffgaff's voicemail. The person you're calling can't take your call at the moment. Please leave your message after the tone. To re record your message, press hash at any time.
Speaker B: Hello, Yasir Hussain here. I just wanted to connect with you regarding your accommodation. I can see you have selected Fusion brand Cross in our website so please reach me out so I can help you out with your accommodation search. Thank you so much.
Speaker A: Welcome to Giftgaff's voicemail. The person.
